Content: A schoolgirl from a school at Atabage in Udagama, Pussellawa has died after she fell sick nearby the school's dancing room. Our correspondent said the girl had complained of a headache at around 12.05 this afternoon (Mar. 02) and then had fainted. She had died upon admission to Gampola Hospital. The victim, a 15-year-old, was a resident of Panvilatenna and the body is kept at Gampola Hospital. Meanwhile, on Wednesday (Feb. 28), a 9-year-old girl died after she had collapsed at the school playground while taking part in a sports activity.
